description: Love was in the air for Everton's Morgan Schneiderlin and his fiancee Camille Sold this week, as they shopped for wedding rings in Manchester city centre.
title: Everton star Morgan Schneiderlin spotted in Manchester
title_page: Everton star Morgan Schneiderlin spotted in Manchester | Daily Mail Online
text:
Love was in the air for Everton's Morgan Schneiderlin and his fiancee Camille Sold this week, as they shopped for wedding rings in Manchester city centre.
The pair got engaged in March last year, and headed out to Deansgate on Thursday afternoon to visit various jewellers.
Schneiderlin had earlier trained at Finch Farm with his Toffees team-mates, before meeting his partner for some retail therapy.
Morgan Schneiderlin holds hands with his fiancee Camille Sold as the pair go shopping
Schneiderlin and Sold looked in good spirits as they wandered around Manchester this week
They seemed in high spirits as they eyed up expensive wedding rings in the window of a jewellers, peering through the glass.
Everton face West Brom this weekend, and Schneiderlin is expected to start after reigniting his career at Goodison Park.
The Manchester United flop was used to a place on the sidelines at Old Trafford, but is back in the starting XI at Everton and firing on all cylinders.
The pair eyed up various rings and other pieces of jewellery in a shop window on Deansgate
Sold posted a picture of herself to Instagram from the pair's outing on Thursday afternoon
Schneiderlin and Sold have been together for a number of years, with the latter staying with him as he moved from Southampton to United to Everton.
As the pair found their feet in Manchester, Sold opted to keep herself busy by working as a shop assistant at adidas in the city centre.
On £10-an-hour while her boyfriend picked up an annual salary of £5million, Sold was pictured wearing a United shirt while at work back in 2015.
Earlier in the day, Schneiderlin had trained alongside his Everton team-mates at Finch Farm
